original_text:
Then they cried to the Lord in their trouble,
    and he delivered them from their distress.
korean_text: 이에 그들이 근심 중에 여호와께 부르짖으매 그들의 고통에서 건지시고

sentences.original_text: Then they cried to the Lord in their trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 곤란 중에 주께 부르짖으니

sentences.original_text: and he delivered them from their distress.
